Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People have been keeping up with a range of news articles that tackle different topics. Mayor Phil Stone welcomed a $2 billion fund to accelerate hydrogen production while Shadow Treasurer Angus Taylor criticized the latest Federal Budget stating that it should have done more for all Australians. Meanwhile disability advocates expressed their dismay over how the Federal Government is trying to contain the cost of the NDIS over the next decade. Western Australia Premier Mark McGowan will present his state budget today and the Opposition will deliver its reply to Tuesday's economic blueprint tonight.
